definitions: with an important role; to a large extent

examples.text: the actor is to figure prominently in the marketing campaign
his wife was prominently involved in local politics

definitions: in a manner that projects or protrudes from something

examples.text: because of their height, the towers stand out prominently
he left his comb protruding prominently from a pile of objects

shortDefinitions: in manner that projects or protrudes from something

definitions: so as to catch the attention; conspicuously

examples.text: posters were prominently displayed in the hall
Paxton's name appears prominently above the title
